the Twitter hashtag welcome to Canada

tweet for you from Julianne Moore now
saying so proud to be Canadian I live in
a country that is choosing compassion
over fear others simply shared an image
of that iconic Canadian Maple Leaf
within a heart with the words welcomed

International Airport of locals waiting
to greet those refugees with welcome
signs and importantly with donations
